verses.verse: וְלִבְנֵ֥י <WH1121> of the sons אַהֲרֹ֖ן <WH175> of Aaron מַחְלְקוֹתָ֑ם <WH4256> Now [these are] the divisions בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> The sons אַהֲרֹ֔ן <WH175> of Aaron נָדָב֙ <WH5070> Nadab וַאֲבִיה֔וּא <WH30> and Abihu אֶלְעָזָ֖ר <WH499> Eleazar וְאִיתָמָֽר׃ <WH385> and Ithamar

וַיָּ֨מָת <WH4191> died נָדָ֤ב <WH5070> But Nadab וַאֲבִיהוּא֙ <WH30> and Abihu לִפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> before אֲבִיהֶ֔ם <WH1> their father וּבָנִ֖ים <WH1121> and had no children לֹא־ <WH3808> no הָי֣וּ <WH1961> and had לָהֶ֑ם <WH1992> like וַֽיְכַהֲנ֔וּ <WH3547> executed the priest's office אֶלְעָזָ֖ר <WH499> therefore Eleazar וְאִיתָמָֽר׃ <WH385> and Ithamar

וַיֶּֽחָלְקֵ֣ם <WH2505> distributed דָּוִ֔יד <WH1732> And David וְצָדוֹק֙ <WH6659> them both Zadok מִן־ <WH4480> at בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> of the sons אֶלְעָזָ֔ר <WH499> of Eleazar וַאֲחִימֶ֖לֶךְ <WH288> and Ahimelech מִן־ <WH4480> at בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> of the sons אִיתָמָ֑ר <WH385> of Ithamar לִפְקֻדָּתָ֖ם <WH6486> according to their offices בַּעֲבֹדָתָֽם׃ <WH5656> in their service

וַיִּמָּצְא֣וּ <WH4672> found בְֽנֵי־ <WH1121> of the sons אֶלְעָזָ֡ר <WH499> of Eleazar רַבִּ֞ים <WH7227> And there were more לְרָאשֵׁ֧י <WH7218> chief הַגְּבָרִ֛ים <WH1397> men מִן־ <WH4480> than בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> than of the sons אִיתָמָ֖ר <WH385> of Ithamar וַֽיַּחְלְק֑וּם <WH2505> and [thus] were they divided לִבְנֵ֨י <WH1121> Among the sons אֶלְעָזָ֜ר <WH499> of Eleazar רָאשִׁ֤ים <WH7218> chief men לְבֵית־ <WH1004> of the house אָבוֹת֙ <WH1> of [their] fathers שִׁשָּׁ֣ה <WH8337> six עָשָׂ֔ר <WH6240> teen וְלִבְנֵ֧י <WH1121> among the sons אִיתָמָ֛ר <WH385> of Ithamar לְבֵ֥ית <WH1004> according to the house אֲבוֹתָ֖ם <WH1> of their fathers שְׁמוֹנָֽה׃ <WH8083> and eight

וַיַּחְלְק֥וּם <WH2505> Thus were they divided בְּגוֹרָל֖וֹת <WH1486> by lot אֵ֣לֶּה <WH428> one sort עִם־ <WH5973> with אֵ֑לֶּה <WH428> with another כִּי־ <WH3588> for הָי֤וּ <WH1961> become שָֽׂרֵי־ <WH8269> for the governors קֹ֙דֶשׁ֙ <WH6944> of the sanctuary וְשָׂרֵ֣י <WH8269> and governors הָאֱלֹהִ֔ים <WH430> [of the house] of God מִבְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> were of the sons אֶלְעָזָ֖ר <WH499> of Eleazar וּבִבְנֵ֥י <WH1121> and of the sons אִיתָמָֽר׃ <WH385> of Ithamar ס

וַֽיִּכְתְּבֵ֡ם <WH3789> wrote שְֽׁמַֽעְיָה֩ <WH8098> And Shemaiah בֶן־ <WH1121> the son נְתַנְאֵ֨ל <WH5417> of Nethaneel הַסּוֹפֵ֜ר <WH5608> the scribe מִן־ <WH4480> from הַלֵּוִ֗י <WH3881> [one] of the Levites לִפְנֵ֨י <WH6440> them before הַמֶּ֤לֶךְ <WH4428> the king וְהַשָּׂרִים֙ <WH8269> and the princes וְצָד֣וֹק <WH6659> and Zadok הַכֹּהֵ֗ן <WH3548> the priest וַאֲחִימֶ֙לֶךְ֙ <WH288> and Ahimelech בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son אֶבְיָתָ֔ר <WH54> of Abiathar וְרָאשֵׁי֙ <WH7218> and [before] the chief הָֽאָב֔וֹת <WH1> of the fathers לַכֹּהֲנִ֖ים <WH3548> of the priests וְלַלְוִיִּ֑ם <WH3881> and Levites בֵּֽית־ <WH1004> household אָ֣ב <WH1> principal אֶחָ֗ד <WH259> one אָחֻז֙ <WH270> being taken לְאֶלְעָזָ֔ר <WH499> for Eleazar וְאָחֻ֥ז ׀ <WH270> and [one] taken אָחֻ֖ז <WH270> taken לְאִיתָמָֽר׃ <WH385> for Ithamar פ
וַיֵּצֵ֞א <WH3318> came forth הַגּוֹרָ֤ל <WH1486> lot הָרִאשׁוֹן֙ <WH7223> Now the first לִיה֣וֹיָרִ֔יב <WH3080> to Jehoiarib לִֽידַעְיָ֖ה <WH3048> to Jedaiah הַשֵּׁנִֽי׃ <WH8145> the second
לְחָרִם֙ <WH2766> to Harim הַשְּׁלִישִׁ֔י <WH7992> The third לִשְׂעֹרִ֖ים <WH8188> to Seorim הָרְבִעִֽי׃ <WH7243> the fourth
לְמַלְכִּיָּה֙ <WH4441> to Malchijah הַחֲמִישִׁ֔י <WH2549> The fifth לְמִיָּמִ֖ן <WH4326> to Mijamin הַשִּׁשִּֽׁי׃ <WH8345> the sixth
לְהַקּוֹץ֙ <WH6976> to Hakkoz הַשְּׁבִעִ֔י <WH7637> The seventh לַאֲבִיָּ֖ה <WH29> to Abijah הַשְּׁמִינִֽי׃ <WH8066> the eighth
לְיֵשׁ֙וּעַ֙ <WH3442> to Jeshua הַתְּשִׁעִ֔י <WH8671> The ninth לִשְׁכַנְיָ֖הוּ <WH7935> to Shecaniah הָעֲשִׂרִֽי׃ <WH6224> the tenth
לְאֶלְיָשִׁיב֙ <WH475> to Eliashib עַשְׁתֵּ֣י <WH6249> eleven עָשָׂ֔ר <WH6240> ten לְיָקִ֖ים <WH3356> to Jakim שְׁנֵ֥ים <WH8147> both עָשָֽׂר׃ <WH6240> ten
לְחֻפָּה֙ <WH2647> to Huppah שְׁלֹשָׁ֣ה <WH7969> three עָשָׂ֔ר <WH6240> ten לְיֶֽשֶׁבְאָ֖ב <WH3428> to Jeshebeab אַרְבָּעָ֥ה <WH702> four עָשָֽׂר׃ <WH6240> teen
לְבִלְגָּה֙ <WH1083> to Bilgah חֲמִשָּׁ֣ה <WH2568> fif עָשָׂ֔ר <WH6240> teen לְאִמֵּ֖ר <WH564> to Immer שִׁשָּׁ֥ה <WH8337> six עָשָֽׂר׃ <WH6240> teen
לְחֵזִיר֙ <WH2387> to Hezir שִׁבְעָ֣ה <WH7651> seven עָשָׂ֔ר <WH6240> teen לְהַפִּצֵּ֖ץ <WH6483> to Aphses שְׁמוֹנָ֥ה <WH8083> eight עָשָֽׂר׃ <WH6240> teen
לִֽפְתַחְיָה֙ <WH6611> to Pethahiah תִּשְׁעָ֣ה <WH8672> nine עָשָׂ֔ר <WH6240> teen לִֽיחֶזְקֵ֖אל <WH3168> to Jehezekel הָעֶשְׂרִֽים׃ <WH6242> the twentieth
לְיָכִין֙ <WH3199> to Jachin אֶחָ֣ד <WH259> The one וְעֶשְׂרִ֔ים <WH6242> and twentieth לְגָמ֖וּל <WH1577> to Gamul שְׁנַ֥יִם <WH8147> the two וְעֶשְׂרִֽים׃ <WH6242> and twentieth

לִדְלָיָ֙הוּ֙ <WH1806> to Delaiah שְׁלֹשָׁ֣ה <WH7969> The three וְעֶשְׂרִ֔ים <WH6242> and twentieth לְמַֽעַזְיָ֖הוּ <WH4590> to Maaziah אַרְבָּעָ֥ה <WH702> the four וְעֶשְׂרִֽים׃ <WH6242> and twentieth פ

אֵ֣לֶּה <WH428> These פְקֻדָּתָ֞ם <WH6486> These [were] the orderings לַעֲבֹדָתָ֗ם <WH5656> of them in their service לָב֤וֹא <WH935> to come לְבֵית־ <WH1004> into the house יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> of the LORD כְּמִשְׁפָּטָ֔ם <WH4941> according to their manner בְּיַ֖ד <WH3027> under אַהֲרֹ֣ן <WH175> Aaron אֲבִיהֶ֑ם <WH1> their father כַּאֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> after צִוָּ֔הוּ <WH6680> had commanded יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> as the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֥י <WH430> God יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> of Israel פ

וְלִבְנֵ֥י <WH1121> of the sons לֵוִ֖י <WH3878> of Levi הַנּוֹתָרִ֑ים <WH3498> And the rest לִבְנֵ֤י <WH1121> [were these] Of the sons עַמְרָם֙ <WH6019> of Amram שֽׁוּבָאֵ֔ל <WH7619> Shubael לִבְנֵ֥י <WH1121> of the sons שׁוּבָאֵ֖ל <WH7619> of Shubael יֶחְדְּיָֽהוּ׃ <WH3165> Jehdeiah
לִרְחַבְיָ֑הוּ <WH7345> Concerning Rehabiah לִבְנֵ֣י <WH1121> of the sons רְחַבְיָ֔הוּ <WH7345> of Rehabiah הָרֹ֖אשׁ <WH7218> the first יִשִּׁיָּֽה׃ <WH3449> [was] Isshiah
לַיִּצְהָרִ֣י <WH3325> Of the Izharites שְׁלֹמ֔וֹת <WH8013> Shelomoth לִבְנֵ֥י <WH1121> of the sons שְׁלֹמ֖וֹת <WH8013> of Shelomoth יָֽחַת׃ <WH3189> Jahath

וּבְנָ֖י <WH1121> And the sons יְרִיָּ֑הוּ <WH3404> [of Hebron] Jeriah אֲמַרְיָ֙הוּ֙ <WH568> [the first] Amariah הַשֵּׁנִ֔י <WH8145> the second יַחֲזִיאֵל֙ <WH3166> Jahaziel הַשְּׁלִישִׁ֔י <WH7992> the third יְקַמְעָ֖ם <WH3360> Jekameam הָרְבִיעִֽי׃ <WH7243> the fourth
בְּנֵ֤י <WH1121> [Of] the sons עֻזִּיאֵל֙ <WH5816> of Uzziel מִיכָ֔ה <WH4318> Michah לִבְנֵ֥י <WH1121> of the sons מִיכָ֖ה <WH4318> of Michah [שָׁמוּר כ] (שָׁמִֽיר׃ <WH8053> Shamir ק)
אֲחִ֤י <WH251> The brother מִיכָה֙ <WH4318> of Michah יִשִּׁיָּ֔ה <WH3449> [was] Isshiah לִבְנֵ֥י <WH1121> of the sons יִשִּׁיָּ֖ה <WH3449> of Isshiah זְכַרְיָֽהוּ׃ <WH2148> Zechariah
בְּנֵ֤י <WH1121> The sons מְרָרִי֙ <WH4847> of Merari מַחְלִ֣י <WH4249> [were] Mahli וּמוּשִׁ֔י <WH4187> and Mushi בְּנֵ֖י <WH1121> the sons יַעֲזִיָּ֥הֽוּ <WH3269> of Jaaziah בְנֽוֹ׃ <WH1121> Beno

בְּנֵ֖י <WH1121> The sons מְרָרִ֑י <WH4847> of Merari לְיַֽעֲזִיָּ֣הֽוּ <WH3269> by Jaaziah בְנ֔וֹ <WH1121> Beno וְשֹׁ֥הַם <WH7719> and Shoham וְזַכּ֖וּר <WH2139> and Zaccur וְעִבְרִֽי׃ <WH5681> and Ibri
לְמַחְלִי֙ <WH4249> Of Mahli אֶלְעָזָ֔ר <WH499> [came] Eleazar וְלֹא־ <WH3808> no הָ֥יָה <WH1961> had ל֖וֹ בָּנִֽים׃ <WH1121> who had no sons
לְקִ֖ישׁ <WH7027> Concerning Kish בְּנֵי־ <WH1121> the son קִ֥ישׁ <WH7027> of Kish יְרַחְמְאֵֽל׃ <WH3396> [was] Jerahmeel

וּבְנֵ֣י <WH1121> The sons מוּשִׁ֔י <WH4187> also of Mushi מַחְלִ֥י <WH4249> Mahli וְעֵ֖דֶר <WH5740> and Eder וִירִימ֑וֹת <WH3406> and Jerimoth אֵ֛לֶּה <WH428> These בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> These [were] the sons הַלְוִיִּ֖ם <WH3881> of the Levites לְבֵ֥ית <WH1004> after the house אֲבֹתֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH1> of their fathers

וַיַּפִּילוּ֩ <WH5307> These likewise cast גַם־ <WH1571> also הֵ֨ם <WH1992> These גּוֹרָל֜וֹת <WH1486> lots לְעֻמַּ֣ת ׀ <WH5980> over against אֲחֵיהֶ֣ם <WH251> their brethren בְּנֵֽי־ <WH1121> the sons אַהֲרֹ֗ן <WH175> of Aaron לִפְנֵ֨י <WH6440> in the presence דָוִ֤יד <WH1732> of David הַמֶּ֙לֶךְ֙ <WH4428> the king וְצָד֣וֹק <WH6659> and Zadok וַאֲחִימֶ֔לֶךְ <WH288> and Ahimelech וְרָאשֵׁי֙ <WH7218> and the chief הָֽאָב֔וֹת <WH1> of the fathers לַכֹּהֲנִ֖ים <WH3548> of the priests וְלַלְוִיִּ֑ם <WH3881> and Levites אָב֣וֹת <WH1> fathers הָרֹ֔אשׁ <WH7218> even the principal לְעֻמַּ֖ת <WH5980> over against אָחִ֥יו <WH251> brethren הַקָּטָֽן׃ <WH6996> their younger ס
